metadata.title: CVE-2021-3756 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
libmysofa is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libmysofa0 - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
